Digital Gardens - Programme of Events

A weekend of workshops, talks, and performances exploring mechanical, algorithmic, and electronic music.

Dai 大 Hall, The Piazza, Unit 29/30, Victoria Lane, Huddersfield HD1 2QF

Digital Gardens Weekend

1st - 3rd September 2023

Friday 1st September

Workshops with I. Nakhla, V Buckenham, Bear Kenchington

All workshops are pay as you feel. We can take card or cash payments on the day.

So we are aware of expected numbers, please register thorugh Eventbrite.
